title: Introducing Codem Web Capture
excerpt: A new browser extension for capturing websites as PNG images with customizable settings.
author: Codem
content:
Meet Codem Web Capture

I've just released a new browser extension called Codem Web Capture that makes it easy to capture websites as PNG images.

Key Features

  • Capture full pages or specific sections
  • Customizable image quality settings
  • One-click downloading
  • Works on most modern websites

This tool was born out of my own frustration with existing screenshot tools that couldn't properly capture entire web pages. After several iterations, I'm happy with how it turned out.

You can download Version 1 from the link in my portfolio.
